BIND_C:BOOL=ON
BIND_CXX:BOOL=ON
BIND_JAVA:BOOL=ON
BUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=ON
BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=ON

CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS:STRING=-Wall -Wextra
CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG:STRING=-g -pedantic

CMAKE_C_FLAGS:STRING=-Wall -Wextra
CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG:STRING=-g -pedantic

CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS:STRING=-Wall -Wextra
CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS_DEBUG:STRING=-g -pedantic

CMAKE_Java_ARCHIVE:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/jar
CMAKE_Java_COMPILER:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/javac
CMAKE_Java_RUNTIME:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/java

JAVA_AWT_INCLUDE_PATH:PATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/include
JAVA_AWT_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/jre/lib/amd64/libjawt.so
JAVA_INCLUDE_PATH:PATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/include
JAVA_INCLUDE_PATH2:PATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/include
JAVA_JVM_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/jre/lib/amd64/server/libjvm.so
Java_JAR_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/jar
Java_JAVAC_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/javac
Java_JAVADOC_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/javadoc
Java_JAVAH_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/javah
Java_JAVA_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=/home/teh/Downloads/Code/jdk1.8.0/bin/java
